channel.title: Bunuel on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Bunuel on Let's see what happens.

item.title: La Charme Discret De La Bourgeoisie
item.description: I saw it before and it left vaguely positive memory. Overall the picture is light, it is composed from losely tied scenes with some level of humour and absurdity. I have enjoyed pleasant dialogues and the level of etiquette. Also humour is low key but can be very fun. Original audio track is a must.
